Oh yeah! Thank you sir! This is such a must have mod when using Sub-Assemblies, I found it funny that the Squad system had the same limitation as the sub-assembly mod that was out prior to 0.22. They should allow you to change the root part, if only to allow to include completed stages. It's rare for my probes to have that leave the root part with an attachment left.

Hurray!
Thank you!
Fantastic idea and job! Thanks so much! This is going to get a lots of use from me.

Got some bugs in the new version.

For some reason, sometimes when I changed the root part it seemed to work fine,

but if then I clicked the new root part to move the whole ship, it all went red and transparent as a detached part.

I even could create a new root part and stack the ship on it, but then it went weird and I had to reload the ship.

Save-loading after the changing solved the problem several times anyway.

Later it worked fine, so I'm not sure what caused that problem.

Will report if it repeats.
